caption: It’s galvanizing to look back at what I’ve done in the past 15 years as a jeweler, captured here by @onlynaturaldiamonds. When I began my journey and career as a master jeweler, I entered the business and trade with no expectations, but as I began to season and conquer my craft, I became aware I was blessed with a gift to create one of a kind diamond creations that would hopefully be recognized by not only jewelry lovers, but the diamond industry itself. I’m beholden to my @IFANDCO family and team to be where I am today and what we’ve accomplished thus far. None of my jewelry accolades were by accident and nothing came easy. I knew early on I needed to be honest to my clients and stick to using only natural diamonds, and now we’re here watching an amazing day in the life video created by @onlynaturaldiamonds 🙏🏼💎 #RareJewels #NaturalDiamonds #BENBALLERDIDTHECHAIN
